pullrequest.title: Force vertical field of view to be lower than 180 degrees

content.raw:
can you instead create a `double LimitFOV(const double _fov)`? We could then also use this function for limiting horizontal field of view later if needed.

So in places where we currently have `setFOVy`, we'll just do `setFOVy(Ogre::Radian(this->LimitFOV(vfov)))`
